name: Good Vibes - The Ride
description:
I wanted to make my own dark ride a la Universal Studios or Disney World so instead I made this weird meme game.

Press Space to Start. Click to take photos. Photos past the 10th will start to overwrite your previous photos.

Screenshots are saved in your "data" directory.

Made in 1 week for Prototype Studio at NYU Game Center. Prompt was: "Polaroids"

Featuring: "Closer" by the Chainsmokers as covered by "Post Modern Jukebox"
